text:
There's an error in the document "Apache performance tuning", section
"HostnameLookups and other DNS considerations".

It says "...the logresolve program that comes with Apache, on one of the
numerous log reporting..." where it should read "...the logresolve program that
comes with Apache, or one of the numerous log reporting...". Changing 'on' by 'or'.
creator: lparra@itboss.com.ar
nick@webthing.com
text: Fixed in svn - should appear on site soon - thanks.
